meanings.definition: A seminar conducted over the internet.
meanings.sent1: Many students attended the webinars to learn about new topics.
meanings.sent2: The company regularly hosts webinars to educate its employees.
meanings.sent3: The webinars were so popular that even the pets in the house wanted to join.
meanings.sent4: The webinars acted as a virtual classroom, connecting learners from different parts of the world.
meanings.sent5: Attending the webinars felt like sitting in a digital auditorium filled with knowledge.

meanings.sent1: The webinars provided valuable information to the participants.
meanings.sent2: Teachers use webinars to engage students in interactive learning sessions.
meanings.sent3: During the webinar, the presenter accidentally shared a funny cat video.
meanings.sent4: Her words during the webinar painted a vivid picture of the historical event.
meanings.sent5: The webinar was like having a knowledgeable friend speak directly to you through the screen.
